00018 #include <votca/tools/cubicspline.h>
00019 #include <votca/tools/table.h>
00020 #include <votca/tools/tokenizer.h>
00021 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include "version.h"
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 namespace po = boost::program_options;
00027 using namespace votca::csg;
00028 using namespace votca::tools;
00029 
00030 void help_text()
00031 {
00032     votca::csg::HelpTextHeader("csg_resample");
00033     cout << "Change grid + interval of any sort of table files.\n"
00034             "Mainly called internally by inverse script, can also be\n"
00035             "used to manually prepare input files for coarse-grained\n"
00036             "simulations.\n\n";     
00037 }
00038 
00039 void check_option(po::options_description &desc, po::variables_map &vm, const string &option)
00040 {
00041     if(!vm.count(option)) {
00042         cout << "csg_resample \n\n";                
00043         cout << desc << endl << "parameter " << option << " is not specified\n";
00044         exit(1);
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00049 {
00050     string in_file, out_file, grid, spfit, comment, boundaries;
00051     CubicSpline spline;
00052     Table in, out, der;
00053 
00054     // program options
00055     po::options_description desc("Allowed options");            
00056     
00057     desc.add_options()
00058       ("in", po::value<string>(&in_file), "table to read")
00059       ("out", po::value<string>(&out_file), "table to write")
00060       ("derivative", po::value<string>(), "table to write")
00061       ("grid", po::value<string>(&grid), "new grid spacing (min:step:max)")
00062       ("spfit", po::value<string>(&spfit), "specify spline fit grid. if option is not specified, normal spline interpolation is performed")
00063       //("bc", po::)
00064       ("comment", po::value<string>(&comment), "store a comment in the output table")
00065       ("boundaries", po::value<string>(&boundaries), "(natural|periodic|derivativezero) sets boundary conditions")
00066       ("help", "options file for coarse graining");
00067     
00068     po::variables_map vm;
00069     try {
00070         po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);    
00071         po::notify(vm);
00072     }
00073     catch(po::error err) {
00074         cout << "error parsing command line: " << err.what() << endl;
00075         return -1;
00076     }
00077     
00078     // does the user want help?
00079     if (vm.count("help")) {
00080         help_text();
00081         cout << desc << endl;
00082         return 0;
00083     }
00084     
00085     check_option(desc, vm, "in");
00086     check_option(desc, vm, "out");
00087     check_option(desc, vm, "grid");
00088     
00089     double min, max, step;
00090     {
00091         Tokenizer tok(grid, ":");
00092         vector<string> toks;
00093         tok.ToVector(toks);
00094         if(toks.size()!=3) {
00095             cout << "wrong range format, use min:step:max\n";
00096             return 1;        
00097         }
00098         min = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[0]);
00099         step = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[1]);
00100         max = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[2]);
00101     }
00102         
00103     
00104     in.Load(in_file);
00105     
00106     if (vm.count("boundaries")){
00107         if (boundaries=="periodic"){
00108             spline.setBC(CubicSpline::splinePeriodic);
00109         }
00110         else if (boundaries=="derivativezero"){
00111             spline.setBC(CubicSpline::splineDerivativeZero);
00112         }
00113         //default: normal
00114     }    
00115     if (vm.count("spfit")) {
00116         Tokenizer tok(spfit, ":");
00117         vector<string> toks;
00118         tok.ToVector(toks);
00119         if(toks.size()!=3) {
00120             cout << "wrong range format in spfit, use min:step:max\n";
00121             return 1;        
00122         }
00123         double sp_min, sp_max, sp_step;
00124         sp_min = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[0]);
00125         sp_step = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[1]);
00126         sp_max = boost::lexical_cast<double>(toks[2]);
00127         cout << "doing spline fit " << sp_min << ":" << sp_step << ":" << sp_max << endl;
00128         spline.GenerateGrid(sp_min, sp_max, sp_step);
00129 
00130         spline.Fit(in.x(), in.y());
00131     } else {
00132         spline.Interpolate(in.x(), in.y());
00133     }
00134     
00135     out.GenerateGridSpacing(min, max, step);
00136     spline.Calculate(out.x(), out.y());
00137     
00138     //store a comment line
00139     if (vm.count("comment")){
00140         out.set_comment(comment);
00141     }
00142     out.y() = out.y();
00143     out.flags() = ub::scalar_vector<double>(out.flags().size(), 'o');
00144 
00145     int i=0;
00146     for(i=0; out.x(i) < in.x(0) && i<out.size(); ++i);
00147 
00148     int j=0;
00149     for(;i < out.size(); ++i) {
00150         for(; j < in.size(); ++j)
00151             if(in.x(j) >= out.x(i)  || fabs(in.x(j)-out.x(i) ) < 1e-12) // fix for precison errors
00152                 break;        
00153         if(in.size() == j) break;
00154         out.flags(i) = in.flags(j);
00155     }
00156     
00157     out.Save(out_file);
00158     
00159     if (vm.count("derivative")) {
00160         der.GenerateGridSpacing(min, max, step);
00161         der.flags() = ub::scalar_vector<double>(der.flags().size(), 'o');
00162         spline.CalculateDerivative(der.x(), der.y());
00163         der.Save(vm["derivative"].as<string>());
00164     }
00165     return 0;
00166 }
